author: Maxwell Britten
description: Bittersweet with rye whiskey's assertive spirituous spice, this is an aperitivo for those occasions when the pre-dinner drink needs to be a sharpener.
name: Brooklyn Heights
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR Italian red bitter liqueur into chilled/frozen glass and turn to coat inside of glass
Discard excess and set glass aside
STIR other ingredients with ice and fine strain into red bitter liqueur-rinsed glass
